Overcoming the Crisis in Politics

5 June, 14.00-15.45

Level 2 Stateroom

Panel discussion covering issues such as entitlement, anger and politics; populism and the rise of minority parties; the role of the media.

Speakers

    Laura Tingle
    Professor Filippo Taddei
    John Daley
    Elina Grundstrom
    Virginia Haussegger AM (Moderator)
